headline: Get $10 of crypto on us through our Blocksend API
description:
A buddy of mine and I have been hacking on an api for crypto called https://blocksend.co.

It's up and running and you can use it for all sorts of projects. One hack was allowing a web2 company to pay twitter followers with crypto from a dashboard, another was offering immediate washout on marketplaces.

To show other founders what we're up to with it, we've loaded up a couple hundred bucks on it, and you can withdraw just by entering your email or text at this link https://app.blocksend.co/hngiveaway.

And if you want any help integrating or getting a key, let us know!
